name: Hutt
special_abilities: Begin with one rank in Enduring talent
Begin with one rank in Nobody's Fool talents
Begin with one rank in Coercion or Discipline
Cannot train Coercion or Discipline above rank 2 during character creation
Ponderous: A Hutt can never spend more than one maneuver moving per turn.
source: FFG Wiki - Lords of Nal Hutta: A Sourcebook for Hutt Space (Page 94)
